full_summary:
**M9 Air Handling Unit Retrofit**
=====================================

**Reference:** cb-696-64220361
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58178
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-14T14:00:00

**Project Overview**
--------------------

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a contractor to retrofit the M9 Air Handling Unit (AHU) at its Montreal Road Campus. The project involves installation of a new pre-heat and bypass steam coil on AHU09 in Building 09.

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

*   Tenders are to be submitted by email only to: `NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca`.
*   The tender package must include the signed Tender form and Bid Security.
*   The contact person is Collin Long, who can be reached at `Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca` or (343) 549-1549.

**Mandatory Site Visit**
------------------------

All bidders must attend a mandatory site visit on December 7th or December 8th, 2023, at 9:30 a.m. Meet Nick Becker at 1200 Montreal Road, Building M9, Main Entrance, Ottawa, ON. Failure to attend will render your tender non-compliant.

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

All bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD). Each bidder personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS approved by CISD. The bidder must also comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual.

**Closing Date**
----------------

The tender closing date is February 14th, 2024, at 14:00. The tender must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender package.

**Attachments**
--------------

The tender package can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell Services website at: `https://canadabuys.canada.ca/`.

Note: Words are less and the content is condensed in a respectful way.
